requestBody.title: Customer one signs up and logs in Snapshot

view.title: Customer one signs up and logs in
view.subtitle: Primary customer account created.

data.instruction: Trigger repeated booking/hold-like attempts to validate throttling, expiry, or non-blocking demand visibility behavior.
data.expectedResult: Abusive attempts are rate-limited or isolated without blocking legitimate customer flow.

data.instruction: Upload snapshots for critical steps and submit final markdown report summarizing pass/fail and discovered gaps.
data.expectedResult: Run has persisted report + snapshots in project directory and indexed metadata in DB.
